entry.title: OData Service Binding | Error 403 Forbidden in BTP ABAP Trial Environment ‚Äî Request Blocked by UCON
entry.content:
I Have serious issue in BTP ABAP Trial Environment.

I am not able to consume any kind of newly created oData service in the ABAP shared Environment. I thought i was doing something wrong by my side, therefore i have also tried to create only a database table in eclipse and let eclipse generate all the artifacts for RAP OData UI Service V4, but i always get the same error "403 Forbidden - Request blocked by UCON". 

I Kindly ask for your suggestions because i wanted to generate a custom RAP Odata UI Service V4 for use in BAS to test apps with the fiori elements generator but i am not able to use the generated OData Service in BAS for error in metadata caused by 403 Forbidden code.

Thank you very much in advance for your attention
Regards,

Andrea Antonio

entry.title: SAP_WFRT does not have authorization for BAL (Abap Environment on BTP)
entry.content:
Hello all,

i am using the Interface IF_SWF_CPWF_CALLBACK.
In the method workflow_instance_completed i want to use cl_bali_log and if_bali_log to write to the Business Application Log.

My Problem is:
The user SAP_WFRT does not have the needed roles for this action.
For me it is not possible to edit the user as it is a SAP technical user.

Is there any solution to my problem?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP BTP JSON Help
entry.content:
We will be calling a SAP BTP service programmatically to perform address validation.  I am new to JSON, and need help programmatically creating the following JSON format.  Can someone please assist me with this?

{

    "addressInput": {

        "country": "US",

        "mixed": "875 NORTH MICHGAN, SUITE 899",

        "locality": "CHICAGO",

        "region": "IL",

        "postcode": ""

    },

    "outputFields" : [

        "std_addr_prim_address",

        "std_addr_sec_address",

        "std_addr_locality_full",

        "std_addr_region_full",

        "std_addr_postcode_full",

        "std_addr_country_2char",

        "addr_asmt_info"

    ]

}

entry.title: ZUI_C_TRAVEL_M_XXX(1) service not available while following the tutorial to create Fiori app
entry.content:
I created a List report Fiori app following the below the tutorial:

Create a SAP Fiori App and Deploy it to SAP BTP, ABAP Environment | SAP Tutorials

I am stuck at Step 4 since I cant find "ZUI_C_TRAVEL_M_XXX(1) - OData V2". Is there an another tutorial that covers the creation of this service as a prerequisite ?

entry.title: want to know how to use this website
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am currently learning and working on SAP ABAP, but I often face a problem when trying to find related blogs or step-by-step solutions on SAP Community.

Even when I search, I get multiple blogs that are not in sequence, or sometimes I can‚Äôt figure out which one is the correct or latest approach. Because of this, I often get stuck when I try to solve real-time issues.

For example, I want to learn Smart Forms, but I don‚Äôt know how to search and how to find the blogs in a proper sequence. In fact, when I face a problem, I don‚Äôt always know how to search on Google regarding that specific issue.

Could someone please guide me on:

  • How to search effectively on SAP Community for specific ABAP topics (like Smart Forms, CDS, or OData)?

  • Any tips or structure to follow while writing a question so I can get better respons

  • How do you personally find the right blogs or resources for complex ABAP issues?

Thank you in advance for your help and suggestions.

Best regards,
Noman

entry.title: BTP ABAP Instance: Change from free service plan to a paid service plan
entry.content:
Hi, the free trial version of our ABAP instance expired today. I was able to switch to the standard plan as described here:

https://help.sap.com/docs/btp/sap-business-technology-platform/using-free-service-plans?locale=en-US#update-to-a-paid-service-plan

It seemed to work so far:

But I can't start it at the moment. It still says ‚Äúexpired‚Äù in the landscape. Will it just take a while? (The change was made a few hours ago) Or do I need to set/change something somewhere?

Thank you and best regards, Stefan

entry.title: Displaying Serial numbers in custom cds views Report
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm currently working on a custom CDS view/report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and would like to display serial numbers (for materials) in the output. Could anyone please guide me on the best approach to achieve this? Specifically, I‚Äôm looking for:

  1. How to include serial numbers in custom CDS views (built in Eclipse ADT).
  2. Whether it‚Äôs possible to fetch and display them directly through released data sources or associations.
  3. Any alternative methods (e.g., using standard I_* views, extensibility options, or Fiori analytical queries) to display serial numbers in reports.

entry.title: Interactive report screen refresh issue cl_gui_alv_grid method used
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

  I have created interactive report with 2 screens 9000 and 9001. When the user click on the line on the 9000 screen , the 9001 screen will give the drill down of that particular record. This is working fine only for the first time. When I go back to 9000 and clicked on the other record, it is not showing the drill down of the newly clicked record, but showing the previous one. Basically the screen is not getting refreshed. 

LASS lcl_event_handler IMPLEMENTATION.
  METHOD handle_double_click.
    IF r_grid_9001 IS NOT INITIAL AND r_container IS NOT INITIAL.
*      CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->free.
*      CALL METHOD r_container_9001->free.
    ENDIF.
    IF rb2 = 'X'.
      DATA: lv_row_index TYPE lvc_index,
            lv_column_id TYPE lvc_fname.

      lv_row_index = e_row-index.
      lv_column_id = e_column-fieldname.

      READ TABLE lt_final INTO DATA(ls_final) INDEX lv_row_index.
      CLEAR gv_rfha.
      gv_rfha = ls_final-rfha.
*    call TRANSACTION zcml_multilat using

      CALL SCREEN 9001.
      EXIT.
    ENDIF.

PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.
  MODULE status_9001.
  MODULE fetchdata.
  MODULE processdata.
  MODULE buildfcat.
  MODULE display.
*
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.
  MODULE user_command_9001.

MODULE display OUTPUT.
* SET PF-STATUS 'xxxxxxxx'.
* SET TITLEBAR 'xxx'.
  CLEAR gs_layo.
  gs_layo-cwidth_opt = 'X'.
*  FREE r_container_9001.
*  FREE r_grid_9001.  "added by pasha 29/10/25

  IF r_container_9001 IS INITIAL.
    CREATE OBJECT r_container_9001
      EXPORTING
        container_name = 'CUST_NEW'.

    CREATE OBJECT r_grid_9001
      EXPORTING
        i_parent = r_container_9001.
****added by pasha****
    DATA lt_dummy TYPE TABLE OF ty_final.
    lt_dummy[] = lt_final_9001[].
*CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->set_table_for_first_display
*  CHANGING it_outtab = lt_dummy it_fieldcatalog = gt_fcat.
****** eoc *************
*    CREATE OBJECT lo_event_handler.
*    SET HANDLER r_grid->handle_double_click FOR lo_alv_grid.

*    CALL METHOD r_grid->refresh_table_display.
    r_grid_9001->check_changed_data( ).
*    CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->free.
*    CALL METHOD r_container_9001->free.
    CALL METHOD r_grid_9001->set_table_for_first_display
      EXPORTING
*       i_buffer_active               =
*       i_bypassing_buffer            =
*       i_consistency_check           =
*       i_structure_name              =
*       is_variant                    =
*       i_save                        =
*       i_default                     = 'X'
        is_layout                     = gs_layo
*       is_print                      =
*       it_special_groups             =
*       it_toolbar_excluding          = lt_exclude
*       it_hyperlink                  =
*       it_alv_graphics               =
*       it_except_qinfo               =
*       ir_salv_adapter               =
      CHANGING
*       it_outtab                     = lt_final_9001
        it_outtab                     = lt_dummy
        it_fieldcatalog               = gt_fcat
*       it_sort                       =
*       it_filter                     =
      EXCEPTIONS
        invalid_parameter_combination = 1
        program_error                 = 2
        too_many_lines                = 3
        OTHERS                        = 4.

    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.
  ELSE.
    CALL METHOD r_grid->refresh_table_display.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
*   Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.
  CREATE OBJECT r_event_9001.
  SET HANDLER r_event_9001->handle_double_click FOR r_grid_9001.

*  DATA : r_event TYPE REF TO lcl_event_handler.
*  CREATE OBJECT r_event.
*  SET HANDLER r_event->handle_double_click FOR r_grid.
*  CLEAR lt_final_9001.  "ADDED 29/10/25
  cl_gui_cfw=>flush( )."ADDED 29/10/25
  rb2 = 'X'.
  REFRESH :  lt_vtbfhapo[], lt_vdarl[], lt_zvdbevi[].
ENDMODULE.

In debugging I can see the correct values are getting into the internal table lt_final_9001 but when it is getting displayed on the screen, it is only displaying the drill down of the one which is clicked for the first time. 
Everything looks perfect in debugging but on screen display the data is not showing correctly. Kindly please help .

entry.title: Get transport long description in BTP ABAP
entry.content: I'm working in the BTP ABAP environment and I need to create an export of transports released between two given timestamps, including their short and long descriptions. The XCO class for CTS does a great job with the search and retrieval of the short description, but for some reason I don't see a way to get the long description. Does anyone know if a way to retrieve this?

entry.title: Incorrect Data Display in Adobe LiveCycle Designer ‚Äì MM Purchase Order Form
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

I am facing an issue where the data displayed in the Adobe LiveCycle Designer form for the MM Purchase Order (PO) does not match the values from the XML source, even though the XML mapping appears to be correct.

Details:

The XML data provided by the functional consultant has been verified and mapped correctly in the Adobe LiveCycle Designer.
As per the XML source:

  • Packing (ZK10) value = 125

  • Forwarding (ZK03) value = 23,000

However, when previewing the Purchase Order form (MM-PO) in Adobe LiveCycle Designer, the table displays incorrect values:

  • Packing (ZK10) = 240

  • Forwarding (ZK03) = 47,50,22,365

The XML mapping and data structure are correct, but the values in the form table are not aligning with the source XML data. This seems to indicate a data binding or layout rendering issue within the LiveCycle form.

The root cause is not yet identified.
Could you please help suggest possible reasons or solutions for this data mismatch issue?

I have attached the following for reference:
FORM TABLE-ADOBE LIVECYCLE DESIGNER

XML DATA SOURCE:

SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe @SAP @SAPExpert @adobe JavaScript

entry.title: Mismatch in Table Display ‚Äì Incorrect Values for Packing and Forwarding in Adobe Form
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

The XML data provided by the functional consultant has been verified and is mapped correctly as per the SAP data in the Adobe LiveCycle designer. As per the XML:

  • Packing (ZK10) value = 125
  • Forwarding (ZK03) value = 23,000

However, when the Purchase Order (MM-PO) form is previewed in Adobe LiveCycle Designer, the table displays incorrect values:

  • Packing (ZK10) is showing as 240
  • Forwarding (ZK03) is showing as 47,50,22,365

The XML mapping and data structure appear to be correct, but the data displayed in the table(form- design Adobe LiveCycle designer) is not aligning properly with the source values. This indicates that the issue is likely related to data binding or layout rendering within the LiveCycle form.

The exact root cause is not yet identified. Could you please check and advise on the possible solution for this mismatch issue?

I have attached the screenshots for your reference

 FORM TABLE-ADOBE LIVECYCLE DESIGNER

XML DATA SOURCE:

Thanks for your support in Advance!
SAP Interactive Forms by Adobe SAP Forms service by Adobe JavaScript @SAP @SAPABAP

entry.title: How to restrict editing of fields like UOM, weight, and volume in Fiori Manage Product Master Data?
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I have a requirement to restrict editing of certain fields such as Unit of Measure (UOM), weight, and volume in the SAP Fiori Manage Product Master Data tile. These fields should be visible but not editable to users for data consistency and control purposes.

Currently, I am exploring various possibilities including:

  • Using UI adaptation/runtime authoring to make these fields read-only

  • Setting authorization roles and restrictions

  • Extending OData services or adding validations on the backend

Could you please share best practices or known solutions to achieve this? Is there any standard way or recommended approach within SAP S/4HANA and Fiori to restrict these specific fields on the product master data app?
SAP HANA Cloud, SAP HANA database  SAP BTP ABAP environment Security NW ABAP User Administration and Authorization SAP BTP Security field masking for Web Client UI

entry.title: Batch Management - Change Events - Clean Core Extensibility
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have a question regarding the right strategy when implementing a customer specific logic in batch management.

The scenario is as follows: 

- There are a couple of batch characteristics which are required to be determined by an external system.

- Whenever a batch is created or changed, it is required to call a couple services (of a third party application) and to persist the results in the batch characteristics and a customer specific table (ODATA Sevices exist). Depending on attributes of the batch and related objects based on different rules different services need to be called and different data needs to be manipulated / persisted.

- Of course, clean core is the Target.

 

Now two approaches are discussed:

(1) implement event(s) in BTP - apply logic etc.

(2) Use RAP - implement event -  apply mentioned logic

Event description here

I have a little experience in BTP and no with RAP. I wonder

(a) are both approaches possible? 
(b) what would be the advantages? Does anyone have experience with a similar scenario?

(c) Are there any limitations you see?

Thanks a lot in advance üôÇ

entry.title: Unable to start BTP ABAP Environment via Landscape Portal ‚Äì "System expected element 'object'"
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

this morning I tried to start my BTP ABAP Environment using the Landscape Portal, the same way I have done several times before. However, the environment no longer starts and instead shows the error message: System expected element 'object'.



When clicking Start, the portal triggers a batch request that fails with 400 Bad Request. The response payload looks like this:

{
   "error":{
      "code":"/A4CLP/MSH_MSG/000",
      "message":"System expected element 'object'",
      "@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory":"Provider_Application_Error",
      "innererror":{
         "ErrorDetails":{
            "@SAP__common.Application":{
               "ComponentId":"BC-ESI-ESF-GW",
               "ServiceRepository":"SRVD",
               "ServiceId":"/A4CLP/MNG_SYS_HIBERNATE_SRV",
               "ServiceVersion":"0001"
            },
            "@SAP__common.TransactionId":"61D0A68A790F482F85DBC57866695E9A",
            "@SAP__common.Timestamp":"20251117064124.696085",
            "@SAP__common.ErrorResolution":{
               "Analysis":"Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
               "Note":"See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"
            }
         }
      }
   }
}

The instance used to start without issues. Now the start operation consistently fails with this error.

Has anyone seen this issue before or knows what might cause this error? Is this related to Free-Tier environments, or is there any known outage or workaround?

Thanks for any insights!

SAP BTP ABAP environment

entry.title: HTML5 Application asking user and password
entry.content:
I created a RAP and deploy it in BaS. In BTP Cockpit, my application appear in HTML5, but when i try to test it, the popup asking user and password appear. I try to put my user and pass, but it doesn't work. I think that some configuration is missing.

I try generate a simple hello world UI5 application and it's work fine. My problem is RAP application (List Report Page).

I found a sapnote 3651537 with error that i get, but i don't understand the solution.

How to solve it?
